name: Serenity Ranch Recovery
description: Serenity Ranch Recovery is a premier luxury drug and alcohol addiction treatment center located in Mammoth Cave, Kentucky. The facility offers comprehensive addiction care with a holistic approach, treating the whole person through evidence-based therapies, trauma-informed care, dual diagnosis treatment, and personalized recovery plans. Services include medical detox for alcohol, opiates, heroin, meth, benzodiazepines, and fentanyl; residential rehabilitation programs; individual and family therapy; trauma therapy; 12-step programs; and holistic therapies. The facility features luxury accommodations, state-of-the-art amenities, 24/7 medical care, and a serene campus setting.
source: Verified from official website and contact information
eligibility: Adults struggling with drug addiction, alcohol addiction, and mental health issues
fees: Insurance accepted, verification of benefits available
notes: Premier luxury addiction treatment center with state-of-the-art facility, luxury bedrooms, dedicated private chef, gaming amenities, movie theater, and comprehensive clinical care. Clinician and medical owned and operated with master-level clinicians and registered dietician. Small groups limited to 12 clients for personalized attention. Family therapy sessions and weekly outings included. Located in the heart of Kentucky near Mammoth Cave National Park.
